short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block certain websites during designated focus times.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Focus Blocker - the ultimate productivity tool for Chrome!

Are you tired of getting distracted by social media, news websites, and other time-wasting sites while working or studying? Focus Blocker is here to help you stay focused and on task.

With our easy-to-use extension, you can block any website you choose, so you can stay away from the distractions and focus on what's important. It's simple to use: just enter the website URLs you want to block, toggle the switch to turn it on, and you're good to go.

We understand that sometimes you need to take a break, so you can disable the extension with a single click.

Focus Blocker is perfect for students, professionals, and anyone who wants to be more productive and stay focused. Don't let distractions hold you back any longer - install Focus Blocker today and start getting things done!

Note: This app is still in development.
